abstract: Fears that the global economy will worsen gripped the financial markets again Tuesday, with downbeat economic news that investors might have shrugged off in calmer times sending the broad stock market tumbling to its lowest level this year.
snippet: Fears that the global economy will worsen gripped the financial markets again Tuesday, with downbeat economic news that investors might have shrugged off in calmer times sending the broad stock market tumbling to its lowest level this year.
lead_paragraph: This looks like a long, hot summer for Wall Street.

headline.main: U.S. Stocks Drop on New Jitters About Global Growth
